name: 10 seconds old
description:
Fight against time in a rogue like dungeon where every 10 seconds makes you age a decade !

How you got there and how can you escape are secondary questions... All you know is if you punch some bad guys and crawl to the next room you can rejuvenate 30years!!

Each ages gives you different stats and abilities, giving you the choice to rush in and save every wrinkle you can or to go older on purpose to play your favorite playstyle (just be careful... your grave might be at the corner if you wait too long...).

- Controls -

  • Move: W/A/S/D or the arrow keys
  • Ability: Spacebar
